# DotNetDocsSettings.TargetFramework property

The target framework from which to generate documentation. (Optional.)

```csharp
public string TargetFramework { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Defaults to any target framework. Supports wildcards, e.g. `"netstandard*"`. Uses the last matching DLL when sorted by path.
